verses.name: Ezekiel 28:18
verses.text: Thou hast defiled thy sanctuaries by the multitude of thine iniquities, by the iniquity of thy traffick; therefore will I bring forth a fire from the midst of thee, it shall devour thee, and I will bring thee to ashes upon the earth in the sight of all them that behold thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:19
verses.text: All they that know thee among the people shall be astonished at thee: thou shalt be a terror, and never shalt thou be any more.

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:20
verses.text: Again the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:21
verses.text: Son of man, set thy face against Zidon, and prophesy against it,
